author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two persons were arrested and 75 kg of sea cucumbers, endangered marine species, were seized from them here on Friday.

According to Forest Guard of Gulf of Mannar Marine National Park, Thoothukudi, A. Kalidoss, the sea cucumbers were stuffed in five gunny bags. Acting on a tip-off, the forest officials arrested the two, K. Sudalaimuthu (30) and S. Arulraj (22) of Mukkani, near the new harbour area when they were transporting sea cucumbers.

They were arrested under the provisions of The Wildlife Protection Act, 1972, he said.
title: 75 kg of sea cucumbers seized; two arrested
